column5: You could automate the threshold parameter for just that section. You could also automate a gate with a slow attack to soften the initial transient for that section.
This videos hits the nail on the head. Really prescient. Have to share with the old man who thinks I'm making this shit up

This is an interesting read about how anxiety can manifest itself as anger in men.
